subject: Baseball
Writing and Writers
lead_paragraph: Adrian Cardenas played for the Cubs in 2012; now 26 and a student at N.Y.U., he wants to be a novelist and explore the world in ways he said baseball would not allow.
snippet: Adrian Cardenas played for the Cubs in 2012; now 26 and a student at N.Y.U., he wants to be a novelist and explore the world in ways he said baseball would not allow.
